name: NotRocketScienceChatBotMilo
0:
”Alexa open milo bot”
”for the current quote”
”for the weather”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: milo bot
des:
Milo is farmer centric cognitive assistant. Designed to become every farmers key business confidant, with daily on-going dialog about variables affecting the producer’s operation.

You can ask Milo for current market quotes and weather..
